# Fundamentals

> Core C# programming concepts including types, classes, interfaces, inheritance, and object-oriented design. Covers program structure, type system fundamentals, exception handling, and coding conventions. Foundation for understanding how C# programs are organized and executed.

## Topic Indices

- [Coding Style](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/csharp/fundamentals/coding-style/llms.txt): 2 topics
- [Exceptions](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/csharp/fundamentals/exceptions/llms.txt): 7 topics
- [Functional](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/csharp/fundamentals/functional/llms.txt): 3 topics
- [Object Oriented](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/csharp/fundamentals/object-oriented/llms.txt): 4 topics
- [Program Structure](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/csharp/fundamentals/program-structure/llms.txt): 3 topics
- [Tutorials](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/csharp/fundamentals/tutorials/llms.txt): 8 topics
- [Types](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/csharp/fundamentals/types/llms.txt): 7 topics
